author: techbro_ccoli
content:
You can try out this branch:  https://github.com/spencer-tb/hive/tree/consume-engine
We are replacing the `pyspec` simulator for a python port called `consume engine` or the `eest-engine` simulator. It can be run with the following:
```
./hive --sim ethereum/eest-block-rlp --client go-ethereum --docker.output
```
